name: Play with your Dog: Dalmatian
description:
The Dalmatian Dog Simulator lets you interact with your canine in many ways. Throw a bone, ball, or Frisbee. These are selected on the right-hand graphic making this super easy.

Age and agility are displayed on the upper left. They are expressed as percentages, so you can see how energetic your virtual pooch is.

Are you up for a challenge?

In sprint mode you can run along with a few other dogs. Gain speed and jump the hurdles. Just click the bottom right button to jump at the right moment. It’s a real race to the finish. Whoever gets there first wins!

Dalmatian Dog Simulator is perfect if you don’t have time to train and house a real pet, but want to experience what it’s like. This dog will obey your every command. You also get to keep it healthy and happy.

It may just be a simulated Dalmatian but you’ll grow attached before you know it.

For all kids at any age !
